useAsPresetToggleDescription.noGame: No game is running, please start a game to use this feature. Undervolting settings will be applied globally.
useAsPresetToggleDescription.withGame: Checking this will save the undervolt settings and will apply them only when {runningAppName} is running instead of applying it globally.

mainMenu.useTimeoutDescription: Checking this will apply the undervolt after some time when {runningAppName} is opened. Might be useful for games with launchers.
